title: New short-tailed whip scorpion species discovered in Amazon

title_detail.value: New short-tailed whip scorpion species discovered in Amazon

summary: A new species of Surazomus, which belongs to the class Arachnida and the order Schizomida, has been discovered in the eastern Amazon, according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: A new species of Surazomus, which belongs to the class Arachnida and the order Schizomida, has been discovered in the eastern Amazon, according to a new study.
